category.name: gallery.album
category.item: ¿Está seguro de que desea eliminar este álbum?

Last update: {@$album->lastUpdateTime|time} - {#$album->images} image{if $album->images != 1}s{/if}{if $album->hasRegisteredAccessLevel()} - Access only for registered users{elseif $album->hasFollowingAccessLevel()} - Access only for users I'm following{elseif $album->hasOwnerAccessLevel()} - Private album{/if}
This album and images in this album can only be viewed by the selected group of people.{if $album|isset} Please be aware that changes are immediately applied to all contained images.{/if}

{if $album->hasRegisteredAccessLevel()}Access only for registered users{elseif $album->hasFollowingAccessLevel()}Access only for users I'm following{elseif $album->hasOwnerAccessLevel()}Private album{/if}
Since new images uploaded by you require approval, you cannot upload futher images into this private album.

category.name: gallery.category
category.item: Do you really want to delete this category? All child categories of this category will be moved to this category's parent category. Images which are only in this category will be deleted.

Images can be up to {@$__wcf->session->getPermission('user.gallery.maxSize')|filesize} each with the file extensions {@$allowedFileExtensions}. Minimum dimensions are {#GALLERY_IMAGE_MIN_WIDTH}×{#GALLERY_IMAGE_MIN_HEIGHT} pixel up to a maximum of {#$__wcf->session->getPermission('user.gallery.maxWidth')}×{#$__wcf->session->getPermission('user.gallery.maxHeight')} pixel. You can upload images using a Zip-, Tar- or Gzip-archive. You can upload up to {#($__wcf->session->getPermission('user.gallery.maxImages') - $userImageCount)} images with a maximum total disk usage of {@($__wcf->session->getPermission('user.gallery.quota') - $usedQuota)|filesize}.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Number of images that should be cycled.
Only images newer than the given period of time are considered for the box “Images in Motion”. [time in days, 0 for infinite]
Only images assigned to the selected categories are displayed in this box, select none to disable.
Number of images that should be cycled.
Only images newer than the given period of time are considered for the box “Image Grid”. [time in days, 0 for infinite]
Only images assigned to the selected categories are displayed in this box, select none to disable.
Only images newer than the given period of time are considered for the box “Latest Images”. [time in days, 0 for infinite]
Only images newer than the given period of time are considered for the most commented images. [time in days]
Restricts the amount of images a user can upload in parallel.
Show number of uploaded images on profile
Maximum number of selected categories per image
Margin to image edges in pixel.
Transparency in percent, 0 equals no transparency.
The placeholder “{literal}{$username}{/literal}” will be replaced with the author’s username.
Heads up! Applying the watermark on the original image is permanent and cannot be reversed later.
Images within the trash bin will be removed after this period. [time in days, 0 to disable]
Show latest images in the profile sidebar
